name: Charged Rounds {VAL}
description: Charged rounds grants electric or ARC damage equal to: {VAL}

name: Servo Boost {VAL}
description: Grants the Titan extended movement capabilities while moving on the ground equal to: {VAL}

name: Heat Evaporation {VAL}
description: While system is active you take no additional heat but also don't don't loose heat aswell equal to: {VAL}.

name: Smart IFF Tagging
description: Allows friendly fire to pass your placed cover while still blocking enemy fire.

name: Ordinance
description: Ordinance used by a titan. These are mainly Auxiliary slots, but could also be found as a titans active ability. Weapons with this tag can only be fired once per round. (Cannot be used in Barrage)

name: Pilot Abilities
description: Pilot tasks that can be started outside your titan but must finish the turn back inside your titan.

name: Charged Equipment {VAL}
description: Activate Equipment at any time, equpment has a max operating time of {VAL}. Decrease the counter value by 1 for every turn it is active. Increase by 1 for every turn inactive until reaching {VAL}. After the equipment has been used you can use the equipment again aslong as the value is atlease equal to 1.
